mapper.insert: INSERT INTO snotice(sNoticeNum, studyNum, notice, userId, nSubject, nContent) VALUES(#{sNoticeNum}, #{studyNum}, #{notice}, #{userId}, #{nSubject}, #{nContent})
INSERT INTO snoticefile(sNoticeNum, originalFilename, saveFilename, fileSize) VALUES(#{sNoticeNum}, #{originalFilename}, #{saveFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT sNoticeNum, notice, n.userId, nickname, nSubject, hitCount, DATE_FORMAT(n.created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created FROM snotice n JOIN memberinfo m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE notice = 1 and studyNum = #{studyNum} ORDER BY sNoticeNum DESC
SELECT s.sNoticeNum, nSubject, hitCount, created, nContent, sum(fileSize) totalFileSize from snotice s LEFT OUTER JOIN snoticefile f ON s.sNoticeNum = f.sNoticeNum where s.sNoticeNum = #{sNoticeNum}
mapper.update: update snotice SET hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE sNoticeNum = #{sNoticeNum}
mapper.select: SELECT snFilenum AS snFilenum, originalFilename, saveFilename, fileSize FROM snoticefile where sNoticeNum = #{sNoticeNum}
